I love that way professor encourage me to learn more by myself, and group discussion. But sometimes it's hard to understand what are the requirement for the assignment and final exam.

People in that department think everything is play time. It is annoying and the professor even engages in jokes or games during the class. It makes people from different departments not want to go to the class or take any other course ICI

Prof HY Chen is a great teacher and the class is very fun! For the reflective journal, I think we don't have time to read others' so I suggest including about 15 minutes during the lecture so everybody can read others' and discuss together
I am pretty satisfy with the environment and content of the class, however sometimes I think some reading material is to hard to understand...
作業說明有時候有點不太清楚，不過課程整體而言很有趣也讓人收穫很多！

可以把全部的作業/期末都寫清楚一些，因為都是很新的做法，同學們比較不熟悉。但是是很好的嘗試，看見老師的用心。但東西太多，沒有計分的東西學生在很忙的時候很難花時間做，會浪費老師設計課程。建議老師還是算分（zine，但給分鬆一點，也讓其他作業報告更加輕鬆。閱讀有的話也可以給同學們翻譯版本會輕鬆、清楚許多。但我很喜歡這堂課。感謝老師和助教的細心，老師很忙，還要照顧線上同學哈哈。老師真的很好。但希望課的算分可以再平均一點。作業量可以再調整。班上的表現或許也可算分以鼓勵同學表現
